text: The Moyar River is one of the tributaries of the Bhavani in Tamil Nadu, India. The Moyar river starts from a small town called Moyar. This is a natural line of separation between Bandipur and the Mudumalai sanctuary to the south. This river is checked (stopped) by Bhavanisagar Dam on the plains near Satyamangalam. ==References== Category:Rivers of Tamil Nadu
title: Moyar River
